name: Cursed Town
description: Discover thet dark story of this abandoned town and its inhabitants.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP3) or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Merom) 1.66GHz or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 950 or equivalent Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Penryn) 2.53 GHz or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 4500MHD or equivalent Storage: 200 MB available space
